title: No purple chest or 400rp
body: I have 2 level 5 smurf accounts that don't have 400rp or the purple chest if this isn't a bug then how do i acquire either?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Were these accounts level 3+ prior to the hextech changes? It's possible you got stuck between the 2 rewards when it was changed.

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support if this is the case.
